name: Lunar Impact (DawsonMajors)
description:
I worked on this project with these two developers and want to give a special thank you to both of them.

Daniel Fink : https://itsfink.itch.io/

Giovanni Sierra: https://giohd.itch.io/

Launch into the depths of space and test your skills as a rocket pilot in our immersive lunar impact puzzle game. With 2.5D gameplay, you'll have to strategize and master the controls to make a safe landing on the various lunar surfaces and become a true space hero.
